name: Raptainment
description: Raptainment is an extensive simulation around the music business. Manage your own rapper, develop the character and plan in detail the next big hit. Release successful albums and play sold-out tours.
minimum_requirements: OS: XP or higher Processor: 1.5 GHz Core2Duo Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: OpenGL 1.4 or better Storage: 200 MB available space Additional Notes: Optimized for screen resolution 1920x1080
